      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      updates model, builds a city in specified location

      ClientModel ServerProxy.buildSettlement(BuildSettlementParams params) 
      ClientModel ServerProxy.buyDevCard(UserActionParams params)
      removes resource cards from player, retrieves development card from bank
      ClientModel ServerProxy.discardCards(DiscardCardsParams params) 
      ClientModel ServerProxy.finishTurn(UserActionParams params)
      end player's turn, start next payer's turn
      ClientModel ServerProxy.getCurrentGame(int version)
      Prepares the version number to be sent over the network, then retrieves current game from server if it's different than the current version
      ClientModel ServerProxy.maritimeTrade(MaritimeTradeParams params)
      trades resource cards according to a certain ratio
      ClientModel ServerProxy.offerTrade(TradeOfferParams params)
      displays to other player a trade offer

      Tells the server to reset the game
      ClientModel ServerProxy.robPlayer(MoveRobberParams params)
      moves the robber, steals a development card from a player
      ClientModel ServerProxy.rollNumber(int number) 
      ClientModel ServerProxy.sendChat(ChatMessage chatMessage) 
      ClientModel ServerProxy.setCommands(CommandList commands)
      Prepares commands to be sent over network, then sends them to server to apply to current game
      ClientModel ServerProxy.updateModel(int version)
      Checks to see if the server's model has been updated, returns the new model if there is a new one available, otherwise returns a null ClientModel
      ClientModel ServerProxy.updateModelNoVersionCheck()

    • Uses of ClientModel in server.facade

      Methods in server.facade that return ClientModel 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ClientModel ServerFacade.acceptTrade(AcceptTradeParams params)
      Has a player accept/reject an offered trade in the model
      ClientModel MockServerFacade.acceptTrade(AcceptTradeParams param)
      Used to accept trades between player, should return a ClientModel that takes into account the newly accepted trade.
      ClientModel ServerFacade.buildCity(BuildCityParams params)
      Builds a city on the map, updates resources and gives settlement back
      ClientModel MockServerFacade.buildCity(BuildCityParams params)
      Builds a city.
      ClientModel ServerFacade.buildRoad(BuildRoadParams params)
      Builds a road on the map, also updates resources and longest road status
      ClientModel MockServerFacade.buildRoad(BuildRoadParams params)
      Builds a new road.
      ClientModel ServerFacade.buildSettlement(BuildSettlementParams params)
      Builds a settlement on the map, updates resources
      ClientModel MockServerFacade.buildSettlement(BuildSettlementParams param)
      Builds a settlement.
      ClientModel ServerFacade.buyDevCard(UserActionParams params)
      Buys a development card for the player
      ClientModel MockServerFacade.buyDevCard(UserActionParams params)
      Player uses this to buy a development card.
      ClientModel ServerFacade.discardCards(DiscardCardsParams params)
      Discards cards of a player
      ClientModel MockServerFacade.discardCards(DiscardCardsParams params)
      Discards a player's cards.
      ClientModel ServerFacade.finishTurn(UserActionParams params)
      Finishes the players turn, transfers playing status to the next player
      ClientModel MockServerFacade.finishTurn(UserActionParams params)
      This effectively ends a player's turn and makes it the next player's turn.
      ClientModel ServerFacade.getCurrentGame(int version)
      Retrieves the current state of the game if the input version is different than the currently stored version
      ClientModel MockServerFacade.getCurrentGame(int version)
      Gets the current Client Model associated with this game.
      ClientModel ServerFacade.maritimeTrade(MaritimeTradeParams params)
      Makes a maritime trade for the player, updates resources of player and bank
      ClientModel MockServerFacade.maritimeTrade(MaritimeTradeParams params)
      Player makes a trade with bank using specified resources.
      ClientModel ServerFacade.offerTrade(TradeOfferParams params)
      Offers a trade from the player to another player
      ClientModel MockServerFacade.offerTrade(TradeOfferParams params)
      Player uses this function to offer a trade to another player.
      ClientModel ServerFacade.playMonopolyCard(PlayMonopolyParams params)
      Plays monopoly card for player, re-allocates specified resource from other players to player
      ClientModel MockServerFacade.playMonopolyCard(PlayMonopolyParams params)
      Plays a monopoly card, steals a resources from other players.
      ClientModel ServerFacade.playMonument(PlayMonumentParams params)
      Plays the monument card for player, gives player victory point
      ClientModel MockServerFacade.playMonument(PlayMonumentParams params)
      Plays a monument card, which gives the player who played a victory point.
      ClientModel ServerFacade.playRoadBuildingCard(BuildRoadCardParams params)
      Plays road building card for player, adds two roads to map and re-allocates longest road correctly
      ClientModel MockServerFacade.playRoadBuildingCard(BuildRoadCardParams params)
      A player will place two roads on the map.
      ClientModel ServerFacade.playSoldierCard(MoveSoldierParams params)
      Plays a soldier card for the player, robs and re-allocates largest army card correctly
      ClientModel MockServerFacade.playSoldierCard(MoveSoldierParams params)
      Moves the robber to a new p;ace and possibly steals someone's resource card.
      ClientModel ServerFacade.playYearOfPlentyCard(YearOfPlentyParams params)
      Plays year of plenty card for player, gives resources to player
      ClientModel MockServerFacade.playYearOfPlentyCard(YearOfPlentyParams params)
      Player plays a year of plenty card, gains two of a certain kind of resource.
      ClientModel ServerFacade.resetGame()
      Clears the command history of the current game
      ClientModel MockServerFacade.resetGame()
      Sets the game back to starting state, which is a canned response (a different ClientModel that that given by getCurrentGame method).
      ClientModel ServerFacade.robPlayer(MoveRobberParams params)
      Moves robber to a new location, allocates random resource from robbed player to robbing player
      ClientModel MockServerFacade.robPlayer(MoveRobberParams params)
      Player uses this to move robber and steal a card.
      ClientModel ServerFacade.rollNumber(int number)
      Rolls a number for the player, updates ClientModel status
      ClientModel MockServerFacade.rollNumber(int number)
      Apply actions given a specific rollNumber of number.
      ClientModel ServerFacade.sendChat(ChatMessage chatMessage)
      Adds a message to the current game's message list
      ClientModel MockServerFacade.sendChat(ChatMessage chatMessage)
      sends a chat message with player name added to the end, should return a ClientModel with the updated chat string.
      ClientModel ServerFacade.setCommands(CommandList commands)
      Executes a list of commands on the current game
      ClientModel MockServerFacade.setCommands(CommandList commands)
      Executes commands inputed by parameter, should return a ClientModel that matches the inputed commands.
      ClientModel ServerFacade.updateModel(int versionNumber) 
      ClientModel MockServerFacade.updateModel(int versionNumber)
      Polls the server for an updated version of the model.

    • Uses of ClientModel in shared.utils

      Methods in shared.utils that return ClientModel 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ClientModel IServer.acceptTrade(AcceptTradeParams params)
      This method will send a response to the server for a trade offer given to the client.
      ClientModel IServer.buildCity(BuildCityParams params)
      This method will build a city for the client.
      ClientModel IServer.buildRoad(BuildRoadParams params)
      This method will build a road for the client.
      ClientModel IServer.buildSettlement(BuildSettlementParams params)
      This method will build a settlement for the client.
      ClientModel IServer.buyDevCard(UserActionParams params)
      This method removes resource cards from player's in return for a development card.
      static ClientModel Serializer.deserializeClientModel(java.lang.String jsonString)
      Client Model deserializer.
      ClientModel IServer.discardCards(DiscardCardsParams params)
      This method will discard a set of cards from the client's hand.
      ClientModel IServer.finishTurn(UserActionParams params)
      This method will end the client's turn and start a new players turn.
      ClientModel IServer.getCurrentGame(int version)
      Prepares the version number to be sent to the server, then retrieves current game from the server if it's different than the current version.
      ClientModel IServer.maritimeTrade(MaritimeTradeParams params)
      This method will complete trade with a maritime port.
      ClientModel IServer.offerTrade(TradeOfferParams params)
      This method will offer a trade with another player.
      ClientModel IServer.playMonopolyCard(PlayMonopolyParams params)
      This method plays a monopoly card from the player's hand.
      ClientModel IServer.playMonument(PlayMonumentParams params)
      This method plays a monument card from the player's hand.
      ClientModel IServer.playRoadBuildingCard(BuildRoadCardParams params)
      This method will play a road building card from a player's hand.
      ClientModel IServer.playSoldierCard(MoveSoldierParams params)
      This method will play a soldier card from a player's hand.
      ClientModel IServer.playYearOfPlentyCard(YearOfPlentyParams params)
      This method will play a year of plenty card from a player's hand.
      ClientModel IServer.resetGame()
      This method resets the game within the server.
      ClientModel IServer.robPlayer(MoveRobberParams params)
      This method will move the robber and steal from a specific victim.
      ClientModel IServer.rollNumber(int number)
      This method will roll the dice for the client if current turn.
      ClientModel IServer.sendChat(ChatMessage chatMessage)
      This method sends a chat message to the server.
      ClientModel IServer.setCommands(CommandList commands)
      Prepares commands to be sent to the server, then sends them to server to apply to current game.
      ClientModel IServer.updateModel(int versionNumber)
      This method will send a signal to the server checking to see if the current version of the model has been changed.
      Methods in shared.utils with parameters of type ClientModel 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.lang.String Serializer.serializeClientModel(ClientModel clientModel)
